name: Winter Green Salad With Walnuts, Apples, and Parmesan-Anchovy Dressing
description: Crisp bitter greens and tart crunchy apple in a savory anchovy dressing.
recipeIngredient: 6 whole anchovy filets, mashed into a paste with the back of a fork
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 whole Belgian endives, core removed, leaves cut into 1/8th-inch slivers
1 quart loosely packed frisée (curly endive) fronds, pale green and yellow parts only (about 2 heads' worth)
1 large tart apple such as Fuji or Granny Smith, cut into 1/8th-inch matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mayonnaise, parmesan, mashed anchovy, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce in a medium bowl and whisk to combine. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Toss endive, radicchio, frisée, apples, and parsley with dressing to taste. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Add nuts and toss briefly. Serve immediately.
